page.title: 10CONNER & GRAHAM BUS COMPANY
page.content: {ESTABLISHMENT }The Company was formed in 1921.There are two garages, the main one being in Easington and a smaller in Withernsea nearby. {Services }Apart from being a private hire section the company has five public service routes. Hull to Easington and Kilnsea Withernsea to Easington,via Sunk Island. Withernsea_Patrington_Burstwick to Asda Superstore. Withernsea to Easington via Holmpton and Welwick. Withernsea_Easington and Kilnsea via Patrinton. {Vehicles}They run 11 single decker coaches,1 double decker coach and 4 mini coaches. {Staff }There are 9 drivers, 1 mechanic 4 admin.staff and 1 conductress_ who is the last in Humberside.
